A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many bad choices made by Rian Johnson\, JJ Abrams and Kathleen Kennedy on this movie. These are experienced film makers. Ok it has to be different but not so radically changed that it spoils what went before. The Anakin lightsaber tossed over the shoulder sums up the whole movie. Surely at Lucasfilm (The biggest Star Wars fans you can imagine)\, someone could have stood up and said \"hang on a minute\" It has soured Christmas.
